articles.title: Gympie shop owner Major Singh hands out $10,000 in supplies to drivers stranded by floods - ABC News
articles.description: As the Mary River in Gympie rose, Major Singh provided a safe harbour for about 300 travellers stranded on the Bruce Highway. Some want him named Australian of the Year for his efforts.
articles.content:
Within five days the Mary River in Gympie climbed from zero to 22.96 metres, making it the city's worst flood since 1893.
